name: Introduction to Media Theory
long_desc: In this course we will look a some theories of mass culture and then theories of particular media forms, including newspapers and magazines, film, sound recording, TV, and social media. Likely theorists included Horkheimer and Adorno, Benjamin, Ohmann, Kracauer, Bazin, Mulvey, McLuhan, Williams, and Smythe.

custom_fields.goals: Basic introduction to media theory at the graduate level for pursuing original research and writing work in the future.
custom_fields.key_topics:
Media theory

Marxist theory

Visual theory
custom_fields.prerequisite_knowledge: 400 level courses in English or related majors
custom_fields.relevance: Theory minis are required for MAs in LCS
custom_fields.learning_resources: Books to be purchases and reading available on the course Canvas site.
custom_fields.extra_time_commitment: Reading and writing outside of class will be required.
